alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Knox; Pierce (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 11:29PM CDT until March 31 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Knox County in northeastern Nebraska... Central Cedar County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Wausa, or 19 miles southwest of Hartington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hartington and Coleridge around 1155 PM CDT. Wynot around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Brooky Bottom, Obert, The Highway 84 and 15 Junction, Bow Valley, Magnet and Pleasant Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
